name: Cavern of Conundrums
description:
The result of a 7-week university project where we had to make a game in Unreal Engine 4 using the theme "Illusion"! This was our final product at the end of the semester, but we plan to keep working on it!

Suddenly finding yourself in a strange underground cavern full of puzzles, switch between two dimensions in order to solve them and escape this place!

Follow our Twitter for updates!

Works with either keyboard or gamepad!
